text: Curtis Graham (born 8 September 1981), is a retired American-born, Micronesian footballer who played as a defender. ==International career== Graham represented the Federated States of Micronesia at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !
